description: A clean design with a boost in warmth, these insulated snow pants feature a waterproof-breathable build that’s critically seam sealed to keep wetness out. The 2-way comfort stretch fabric offers freedom of movement, while a thermal-reflective lining helps maintain body heat. They're durable and dependable for hitting the slopes.
name: Columbia Sportswear Shafer Canyon Pants, Reg - Big - Mens
